node.title: Territorians flocked to COVID vaccine clinics before mandate deadline, data shows
node.alt: People stand in line outside a Darwin vaccination centre.
node.description: Thousands of people have lined up to get vaccinated at clinics in the Northern Territory. But not all of them have been happy to be there.
node.content:
["The Northern Territory's COVID-19 vaccine uptake rate is outpacing the rest of Australia, with more than 5 per cent of Territorians receiving their first dose in the past week.", "The recent surge in bookings has been partly prompted\u00a0by the NT government's far-reaching vaccine mandate for public-facing workers, which came into effect on Saturday.", "Over the past week alone, the NT recorded four of its largest vaccination\u00a0days since the start of the rollout.\u00a0", "On Friday \u2014 the final chance for many workers\u00a0to get at least one vaccine dose or risk losing their job\u00a0\u2014 more than 3,000\u00a0Territorians lined up to receive a jab, according to federal data.", "However, while huge numbers turned up at vaccine clinics, it was not a record-setting day.", "Federal health data shows\u00a0last weekend's\u00a0lockout scare had a larger impact on vaccine uptake than the looming mandate, with more than 4,500 people receiving either their first or second\u00a0vaccine dose\u00a0the day after\u00a0restrictions were announced.", "Palmerston GP Super Clinic CEO Robyn Cahill said appointments at the clinic had tripled in the past week, with\u00a0some reluctant vaccine recipients causing a \"challenging\" time for staff.", "\"We've had quite a mixed approach from people,\" she said.", "\"We've had people who've said, 'I just didn't get around to it,' to people who've been quite angry and very aggravated and made sure we all knew they were very angry about having to have the vaccine.\"", "", "
Ms Cahill urged people to be polite toward her staff at the clinic.(ABC News: Hamish Harty)
", "That sense of frustration was on display in Darwin on Saturday afternoon, when police said about 400 to 500 people marched to protest against the NT government's vaccine mandate.\u00a0", "A spokesman for NT Police said a\u00a0man and a woman were arrested and fined $190\u00a0for walking along the roadway.\u00a0", "However, he said the vast majority of protesters were \"very well behaved\".", "Police thanked them for their good behaviour.", "
Anxiety in the vaccine queue despite evidence
", "Some Territory workers lining up for the jab at the Marrara vaccine clinic said they were unhappy they had to get vaccinated.", "Kelly Turner works in early childhood education and is required to travel to remote communities as part of her work.", "\"I don't feel good about it [getting the vaccine],\" she said.", "\"I'm very anxious.\u00a0It doesn't sit right with me.", "\"I'm doing it purely so I can keep my job.\"", "", "
Ms Turner was among those who did not want to get vaccinated\u00a0but did so to keep their job.(ABC News: Myles Houlbrook-Walk)
", "She said if she could continue working\u00a0without getting vaccinated she would.", "\"I'm a kindergarten teacher \u2026 specifically with my role I go out to remote communities,\" she said.", "\"I also work in the community with vulnerable people.\u00a0", "\"My hands are tied. I have no choice.\"", "Sixteen-year-old Jeremy Lai works as a front-end worker at a supermarket\u00a0in Darwin and put his delay down to apathy.", "", "
Jeremy Lai says his mother had to hassle him to get vaccinated.(ABC News: Myles Houlbrook-Walk)
", "\"I don't know really, I just got it.\u00a0I'm alright now. I didn't really worry about it before, but I guess you had to get it,\" he said.", "Though he said he was not ideologically opposed to the vaccine, he admitted his family had to hassle him to get it done before November 13.", "\"My mum made me do it,\" he said.", "\"It's for work so I might as well do it.\"", "He said he did not know of any co-workers refusing the vaccine.", "\"I haven't seen any yet, so it's good I guess,\" he said.", "", "
How to take a rapid antigen test.
"]
